pentago

Class ComputerPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • pentago.Player
      • pentago.ComputerPlayer

  • class ComputerPlayer
extends Player
    Determines a semi-intelligent computer player that can choose its next move and rotation based on Minimax decision rule. For more information about Minimax decision rule, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Minimax

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Board board
      The pentago game board
      private MiniMax miniMax
      Minimax decision rule For more information about Minimax decision rule, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Minimax
      private java.lang.String nextRotation
      Next chosen rotation

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ComputerPlayer(Board board, MiniMax miniMax)
      Constructor that initializes player.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) java.lang.String getNextMove()
      Chooses the best move and rotation from available moves to be used as the current move of computer player in play to computer game mode.
      It uses Minimax decision rule to perform choosing next move and rotation.
      (package private) java.lang.String getNextRotation()
      Gets chosen next rotation computed using Minimax decision rule.

      • Methods inherited from class pentago.Player

        getPiece, setPiece, toString

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getNextMove

        java.lang.String getNextMove()
        Chooses the best move and rotation from available moves to be used as the current move of computer player in play to computer game mode.
        It uses Minimax decision rule to perform choosing next move and rotation. For more information about Minimax decision rule, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Minimax
        Specified by:
        getNextMove in class Player
        Returns:
        next move string for computer player

      • getNextRotation

        java.lang.String getNextRotation()
        Gets chosen next rotation computed using Minimax decision rule.
        Specified by:
        getNextRotation in class Player
        Returns:
        next rotation string for computer player
        See Also:
        getNextMove()
